Department: Lee Kuan Yew School Of Public Policy
ModuleDescription:
This module is intended for individuals who are interested
in the functions of the market in modern economies and
who in the course of their careers may be in positions of
regulating market behaviour for public policy purposes.
The focus is to identify what makes the market imperfect or
cause market failures. The course will also examine the
appropriate form of governmental intervention.
Prerequisite: No pre-requisite. Required economic concepts would be taught as part of the course.
